title: ASTIN Bulletin
additional-note: This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Copyright notices and US-dollar subscription rates were published in issues by the late 1980s; I do not know exactly when either of those began.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Alison Miner for copyright research on this title.
